message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specific details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you.  I'm prepared to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a chance to acquire a truly game-changing asset. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
